WRITING.TITLE: My Dilemma
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi guys. So here's my situation. I independently homebrewed Death's Shadow Jund months ago and was crushing FNMs and kitchen tables. Then the deck caught on and is everywhere.
Now I went to a new store and they accused me of being a filthy netdecker! What do I do? Please advise.

We want Magic Online to be the best place to play non-rotating Constructed formats.

What we call "Pack War" is just gambling. Each player buys a pack and opens it. Whoever opens the card with the highest cmc wins the contents of both packs.
